content: U.S. treatment session revenue was $11.3 million up 5% over the second quarter of 2021. growth was a result of improving utilization rates attributed to the increasing traction of marketing program, including the tap into new possibilities for depression digital campaign, which is garnered over $144 million impressions since its launch on March 3, and our partnership with Drew Robinson achieved hundreds of millions of new impressions, and other initiatives we have put into place over the last 24 months.
